import '../style/productCard.css' import PhotoProduct1 from '../img/Hair care.png' import PhotoProduct2 from '../img/Hair care1.png' import PhotoProduct3 from '../img/Hair care2.png' import PhotoProduct4 from '../img/Hair care3.png' import Buttons from './Buttons' const hairCare = ({incrementProductQuantity}, onSelectProduct) => { const clickButton = (e) => { incrementProductQuantity(); const productItem = e.target.closest('.product_items'); const image = productItem.querySelector("img").src; const name = productItem.querySelector("h5").textContent; const product = { image: image, name: name }; onSelectProduct(product); }; const addCard = "add_product_in_basket" const seeMore = "see_more_button" return (

); } export default hairCare;
